sentences.en: Being late so often will jeopardize your chances for promotion.
sentences.cn: 这么常迟到会危及你升迁的机会.

sentences.en: He has jeopardized his future career.
He would never do anything to jeopardize his career.
sentences.cn: 他决不会做任何有损于他事业的事。

sentences.en: His foolish behaviour may jeopardize his whole future.
sentences.cn: 他的愚蠢行为可能会危及他的整个前途.

sentences.en: If I went out and accepted a job at a lot less money, I'd jeopardize a good career.
sentences.cn: 我要是出去接下一份报酬低很多的工作，这将危及我的大好前程。

sentences.en: If you are rude to the boss it may jeopardize your chances of success.
sentences.cn: 如果你对上司无礼,那就可能断送你成功的机会.

sentences.en: It could jeopardize all other business.
sentences.cn: 毒品还可能危及其他一切生意.

sentences.en: Jack adamantly refuses, explaining that CTU involvement could jeopardize his family's safety.
sentences.cn: 杰克坚决地反对, 因为他认为反恐组的介入会使危害到他家人的安全.

sentences.en: large-scale military offensives which could jeopardize the UN peace process
sentences.cn: 可能会破坏联合国和平进程的大规模军事进攻

sentences.en: More than two unexcused absences will seriously jeopardize your class participation grade.
sentences.cn: 超过两次无故缺课将严重危及你的课堂参与评分.
工作过量可能会危及你的健康。

sentences.en: The dispute could jeopardize the negotiations.
sentences.cn: 那一争论可能会使谈判处于险境。

sentences.en: This could jeopardize our business relationship, so to speak.
sentences.cn: 可以说这会危及我们的业务联系.

sentences.en: This judgment may jeopardize his job.
sentences.cn: 这项判决可能会使他的工作陷入险境.

sentences.en: This, in turn , might jeopardize the Navy's fuel supply.
sentences.cn: 这可能破坏海军的燃料供应.

sentences.en: To burn your bridges will jeopardize your future career.
sentences.cn: (过河拆桥的做人处事,将会影响到你的事业前途. )

sentences.en: Would such legislation jeopardize chances for a treaty?
sentences.cn: 制定这样的法律会危及签约的可能性 吗 ?

trans.tran_en: to risk losing or spoiling something important

trans.tran_cn: 危及，损害，使陷入险境或受伤，使…遇险
trans.tran_en: to risk losing or spoiling something important
